context: Does the remote stay "on", or will it shut itself off like the controller?
response: It is an Infrared remote that has motion sense backlights. It is then "off" till you press a button, or move it to get the lights to come on. Battery life has been good so far. I got mine on release date and it is still on the first set of batteries with no noticeable signal strength loss.

context: If connected to PS4 with a cable, can you control chat volume and Mute by button which on the headset?
response: Sorry my response was for PS3 and PS3 doesn't need a cable (Xbox does), for ps4 you need the talk back cable (similar to the cable you need for Xbox one).

context: Should I have played other Pikmin games before playing Pikmin 3?
response: Honestly it does not make a difference. There are a few references to one and 2 that you might not 'get', but I don't think you'll miss anything major. Many mechanics are new or changed and everything you'll need to know is explained in game (or left as a puzzle for you to solve, obviously).

context: Does the game help you tune your guitar?
response: Only when you're playing it. Once it's in tune, based on the quality of your guitar, it should stay tuned. To that key anyway. When I change key in the game it automatically prompts me to tune it and the tuning feature is actually quite  helpful. Usually takes less than a minute with my guitar. Hope that helped.

context: Does this keyboard have stands in the back that will arch it up? I can't really type with the keyboard flat. :c
response: Yup, the keys feel real nice too when their pressed.

context: Just wondering, does this collection has separate registration codes for the different expansions or just one for the whole package?
response: Just one for the whole package

context: Is this any different from the psp demon fleeting game? or the same?
response: It has a bonus High School Mode.

context: will it run properly on window 7
response: It doesn't run on my PC with windows 7. So l put it on an xp machine and it works fine.

context: How does this feel in the hand? Cheap? Sturdy?
response: Sturdy and very comfortable

context: Can this game be used with the original wii if you don't care or want the u game pad
response: you still need a second remote because in some games you are pitted against each other. also i dont think it can be played on the original wii because it requires the little game pad that is with the wii u

context: Does this work with a PS4?
response: Dont think so. I know the Xbox one definitely doesn't fit.

context: Can this camera work on skype for my psp 3000?
response: in a word, Yes.

context: does it work on Windows 7?
response: yes when in compatibility mode

context: how does it connect in the bluetooth setting or do i just plug it in with the usb wire and it automatically syncs?
response: Wired USB is used for charging... comes with a USB for charging or u can use the one that came with the ps3... for wireless use plug in the included wireless USB and it immediately is ready to use, no sync required! I've had mine for months and I've only had to charge it twice! great buy!!!

context: does this version require me to load it via a cd drive or will it allow me to just download it on steam?
response: I opted for the DVD.  The online download was available.

context: Why does it have a Teen rating vs. Mature?
response: Well, there really isn't much mature content in the game at all. Very minor coarse language, no smoking/drinking, no sexual themes. There's violence, sure, but no excessive gore or blood.

context: Does it work with Windows 7
response: Its a generic version of the first xbox controller

context: Will the 2DS in a neoprene cover fit inside this case?
response: My son has a 2DS and it fits in this case. So yes it should fit.

context: Can all those mods work for online if it does i will buy it then just want my question answer
response: Some work some dont!

context: Does this have yaw control? As in, can you twist the stick clockwise/counterclockwise?
response: rudder controls are on the front of the throttle lever, its a rocker you control with your fingers.

context: Does this use the classic controller?
response: No, I purchased the controllers for a different game I had bought from the Wii store.

context: what exactly is included within this bundle besides a Vita?
response: The vita, a 4 gb Sim card, USB cable, ac adapter, ac power cord, printed materials.

context: If I want to put this on my 360 can my friend put it on HIS Xbox 1..?
response: No its under you gamertag. After you install it on the 360, you'll have it available for download on xbox 1. You could put a profile on his xbox and download it that way...

context: is this compatible with windows 7 64 bit
response: Yes. I play the game with windows 7 64 bit It works very good

context: I realize that its an MMO, but do you need a Gold membership on Xbox live even if you just want to play single player? Is there even single player?
response: Once a year Gold Live is on sale. It seems you may need Gold to play on Xbox. Enjoy...

context: I have a sealed copy of MLB 13 sitting next to me. Is it worth upgrading to MLB 14? I can't afford a PS4 now, so the PS3 version is my only option.
response: I myself could not afford ps4 but bought mlb 14 for ps3.  So far online play was extremely bad.  Very choppy online play. Issues with responsiveness and graphics issues.   If I knew that I would have just kept playing mlb13 and then upgrade to ps4 next year after the bugs are out.

context: So i can game online and there will no prob considering it from japan?
response: Yes, as long as you create a north american psn account. The only difference is the circle and x buttons in vita menu: circle is enter and x is cancel. I'm not sure about return policies or warranties though, in case your vita has problems. My vita has been good so far.

context: Will I be able to play my original xbox games on my 360 slim with kinect with this hard drive plugged in?
response: Yes, but there is a list of certain games that can be played on the 360. The list can be found here: http://support.xbox.com/en-US/xbox-on-other-devices/original-console/play-original-games

context: How's the overhead band size, and the size of the ear cups? Looking for headset that I can wear for hours and for gaming.
response: The headset is incredibly comfortable, and fits snug over the ears(not on top of them). I'm a pretty avid gamer, and I don't have any complaints about how they feel or how they sound. Longest amount of time I've clocked with these on at once would probably be around 6-7 hours.

context: Is this an official Nintendo product?
response: Yes, I believe it is official but is an imported Japanese controller. Up until now I haven't had an issue with the controller and everything work right out of the box.

context: will this work for xbox live?
response: Well it's ment for a PC not an Xbox.

context: will this work with 64bit os?
response: Yes it does, that is what I'm using.

context: Do we need a "joystick" type device or will the games work with just a mouse?
response: A mouse is sufficient. Some of the words games respond to keyboard keys. I love the games ... I have two programs, one is for only Hoyle card games, and the other is this one mostly puzzles and games that don't need special equipment.

context: Does DSi 3.25 play DS games?
response: Yes it works smoothly. So far I've had no problems with the system.

context: How do i install the addon after i install the base game?
response: It should be in "exe" file so just press avto install.

context: What happens if your batteries die, or perhaps you remove the battery pack (by mistake of course).  Will this trick work to render a pause?
response: No, this is a real time game so there is no pause besides quitting to the main menu

context: Can this be used to charge a single Sixaxis controller?
response: Yes, it does not matter how many slos are plugged. A single filled/plugged slot still gets charged as normal.

context: Does this one give me Founder Status with the 8 Character slots, 4 bank slots and all, or do I need the Collector's edition instead for those benefit?
response: I purchased this one and I have founder's status.  All you'll have to do is log onto your enmass account on their website, go to account settings, and there should be a way to input the cdkey.
